  "authors": "Wael Abu-Shammala and Alberto Torchinsky",
  "title": "The Hardy-Lorentz Spaces $H^{p,q}(R^n)$",
  "comments": null,
  "journal-ref": "Studia Math. 182 (2007) no. 3, 283-294",
  "doi": null,
  "report-no": null,
  "categories": "math.CA math.FA",
  "license": null,
  "abstract": "  In this paper we consider the Hardy-Lorentz spaces $H^{p,q}(R^n)$, with\n$0<p\\le 1$, $0<q\\le \\infty$. We discuss the atomic decomposition of the\nelements in these spaces, their interpolation properties, and the behavior of\nsingular integrals and other operators acting on them.\n",
